## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1196325ccb4bae5da01f646db60a3c5bcde7dabeb0b4d1615a35a8e6a21f1375)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'zora1abs-protoc-helper' @ 999.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
